description:
Dazai sends Akutagawa on some errands, but despite his best efforts, he doesn’t seem to have what it takes to go shopping.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akutagawa-kun no Otsukai / Korosazu no Mafia / Aitsu to Combi: Maji Hen
Akutagawa-kun`s Errands / The Mafia Member Who Doesn`t Kill / Forming a Duo with Him: The Serious Part
芥川君のお遣い / ころさずのまふぃあ / アイツとコンビ~本気[マジ]編~
